item.description:
What sort of future will it be if we create human clones to supply organ donations?   What would it be like to learn that you are a clone fated to 'donate' your life?


Never Let Me Go, is the critically acclaimed novel by British author Kazuo Ishiguro.

The movie description from IMDB.com:

"As children, Ruth, Kathy and Tommy, spend their childhood at a seemingly idyllic English boarding school. As they grow into young adults, they find that they have to come to terms with the strength of the love they feel for each other, while preparing themselves for the haunting reality that awaits them."

The movie stars Keira Knightley, Carey Mulligan and Andrew Garfield.

We'll meet outside the Coolidge Corner Theater at 2PM Saturday for the 2:30PM show.   

After the film we'll go out for coffee or ice cream and discuss the movie and the ethics issues raised.






Never Let Me Go, trailers
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me outside the theater at the box office
item.name: Movie: Never Let Me Go
